ygData.subject: OT: Re: [EverQuest] hey ppl read this  if intrested in equestrielle
ygData.msgSnippet: The point is that it is not acceptible during education. That is when writing is supposed to be formal. Spelling and grammar do matter then. However, in an
ygData.messageBody:
The point is that it is not acceptible during education. That is when
writing is supposed to be formal. Spelling and grammar do matter then.
However, in an e-mail list of an informan nature, such as this one, it is
not a big deal.
So.. lets somehow get this back on topic with Everquest. :-)
luv,
-Su

> And that is why when my son (5th grade) and my Daughter's (11 grade)
teachers and I say TEACHERS send home homework assignments, news and
information about the school my wife and I sit there and shake our heads
over the grammmatical and spelling errors...because "it's not that big of a
thing" and people wonder why the education system is in such sad shape.
Jerry
>
> TY!! veyr much for understanding me!!
> -lori
>
> Jordon E Perez <jphello999@...> wrote:
> omg who cares its just spelling and we should be able to spell however
> the he** we want to
